message: Accept my generous offer and we can end this game quickly!
I'm willing to give you a fair share, but not as generous as your offer. Your turn!
This is a fair offer, don't make me go lower!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much. Your turn again!
I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need a good deal!
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, but I'm still willing to make a deal. Your turn again!
I'm trying to be realistic, but I need a good deal to make up for the losses!
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still willing to make a deal. Your turn again!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to accept your final offer, I'll make a final counteroffer. Take it or leave it!
This is my absolute final offer, take it or leave it! I'm not going to make another proposal!
I'm not going to accept your final offer, I'll make one last attempt. Take it or leave it!
